**Asking Your Brother for Help:**

That's a great idea! Asking your brother to help with the party setup can be a wonderful way to involve him in the celebration and get some extra hands on deck. Since he's handy with DIY projects, he can probably help with setting up the decorations, tables, and other elements that require some manual labor.

**Benefits of Asking for Help:**

1. **Shared Responsibility:** By asking your brother to help, you'll be sharing the responsibility of party planning and setup, which can be a big help.
2. **Special Bonding Time:** Working together on the party setup can be a great way to bond with your brother and create some special memories.
3. **Fresh Perspective:** Your brother might bring some new ideas and perspectives to the party planning process, which can be really valuable.

**Tips for Working with Your Brother:**

1. **Communicate Clearly:** Make sure to communicate clearly with your brother about your vision for the party and what you need help with.
2. **Assign Tasks:** Divide up the tasks and responsibilities so that you both know what you're working on and can stay organized.
3. **Be Flexible:** Be open to your brother's ideas and suggestions, and be willing to adapt to any changes or challenges that come up.

By working together, you and your brother can create a beautiful and memorable Garden Party for your mom. I'm sure she'll appreciate the effort and love that goes into making this special day happen.
